topics.body:
I just had a funny thought.

If I had a kid, I want him to go to the shopping mall, cry a bit while I hide at a bench, and when someone goes to him and asks him his father's name, he would say "Mufasa..."

And then I'd laugh, apologize to the person and me and my kid go get ice-cream.
